title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan & Phone Screener Abby
itunes:title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan & Phone Screener Abby
description:
Things have gotten interesting on the show this week as we received some big updates in the case of Abby & her random texter, so Morgan & Abby break it all down. They also share updates in their dating lives, plus they reveal their favorite ever performances on the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
